name: Invoke-Obfuscation COMPRESS OBFUSCATION
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via COMPRESS OBFUSCATION
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*new\-object* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*text.encoding\]\:\:ascii* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*system.io.compression.deflatestream* OR *system.io.streamreader*) AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*readtoend)`
